title: Pure
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Juice bar, Take-out, Caribbean, Jamaican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Aside from 3 fish dishes menu is all vegan and often has vegan muffins. Jan 2016 this replaced the previous veg eatery by the same name. Smoothies and fresh juices. Has a grab n go cooler with prepared food.
